text: Anthony John "Tony" Soprano is an Italian-American fictional character on The Sopranos. He is a troubled crime boss who leads many criminal organizations and struggles to balance his family life and Mafia career. Soprano was born in Newark, New Jersey. Soprano was played by James Gandolfini, who became famous for his performance. Entertainment Weekly listed Gandolfini as the 42nd Greatest TV Icon of All Time. ==References== Category:Fictional American people Category:Fictional criminals Category:Fictional people with antisocial personality disorder Category:People from New Jersey Category:Television characters
title: Tony Soprano
